description: Numbers n such that 2*25^n - 1 is prime.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

C. R. Zarnke and H. C. Williams, Computer determination of some large primes, pp. 563-570 in Proceedings of the Louisiana Conference on Combinatorics, Graph Theory and Computer Science. Vol. 2, edited R. C. Mullin et al., 1971.
mathematica: Do[m = n; If[PrimeQ[2*25^n - 1], Print[n]], {n, 1, 10^3}]Select[Range[0, 5000], PrimeQ[(2*25^# - 1)] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 25 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
